mapper.insert: insert into XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY( CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, DESCRIPTION, SEQ, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, USERALLMONEY, USERFREEZEMONEY, MEMBERMOMEY_ID ) values ( #{CREATEDATETIME}, #{UPDATEDATETIME}, #{CREATEUSER}, #{UPDATEUSER}, #{KEYWORD}, #{DESCRIPTION}, #{SEQ}, #{LOGINNAME}, #{USERNICKNAME}, #{USERREALNAME}, #{USERALLMONEY}, #{USERFREEZEMONEY}, #{MEMBERMOMEY_ID} )
mapper.update: update XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY set MEMBERMOMEY_ID = MEMBERMOMEY_ID where MEMBERMOMEY_ID = #{MEMBERMOMEY_ID}
mapper.select: select CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, DESCRIPTION, SEQ, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, USERALLMONEY, USERFREEZEMONEY, MEMBERMOMEY_ID from XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY where MEMBERMOMEY_ID = #{MEMBERMOMEY_ID}

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SEQ, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.USERALLMONEY, a.USERFREEZEMONEY, a.MEMBERMOMEY_ID from XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY a

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SEQ, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.USERALLMONEY, a.USERFREEZEMONEY, a.MEMBERMOMEY_ID from XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY a
mapper.delete:
delete from XNHB_MONEY_MEMBERMOMEY where MEMBERMOMEY_ID in
